title: 2025 U - 17 W / Cup : Flamingos to discover opponents Wednesday
body_text:
Sport
2025 U-17 W/Cup: Flamingos to discover opponents Wednesday
Nigeria’s Flamingos will know their group opponents at the 2025 FIFA U-17 Women’s World Cup on Wednesday.
The draw ceremony will hold in Rabat, Morocco.
Twenty-four countries will take part in the competition for the first time since its inception.
The Flamingos have been placed in Pot 1 alongside hosts Morocco (one of Africa’s five flag-bearers),
Spain, Japan, North Korea (cup holders), and USA.
Nigeria will be making her eighth appearance at the biennial competition.
Bankole Olowookere’s side took part in the women’s football event at the 2024 National Sports Festival as part of their preparation for the competition.
